title: Agate Fossil Beds National Monument: Distance Learning
body: Distance Learning          Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Agate Fossil Beds National Monument Distance Learning    Students will be able to communicate with an Agate Fossil Beds ranger to learn more about the Miocene mammals and the historic excavations that uncovered them.    Type:Distance Learning Grade level:General Subjects:Geology, Paleontology National/State Standards:Nebraska  K - 2nd: 1.1, 2.1.1.a, 2.1.1.d  3rd - 5th: 1.2, 5.1.2.a, 3.4, 5.3.4.a  6th - 8th: 4.4, 8.4.4.b  9th - 12th: 3.4, 12.3.4.c, 4.4, 12.4.4, 12.4.4.b
